original:
Choose the conditions
for this match.
translation:
Choose the conditions
for this match.

original:
Searching for opponents.
Please wait a moment.
translation:
Searching for opponents.
Please wait a moment.

original:
Searching for opponents.
Please wait a moment.
It is possible that you
may not be able to
gather four people.
translation:
Searching for opponents.
Please wait a moment.
It is possible that you
may not be able to
gather four people.

original:
You have not registered
anyone in your friend
roster, so you cannot
play.
translation:
You have not registered
anyone in your friend
roster, so you cannot
play.

original:
Your friend roster is full.
Enter a friend code after
erasing data.
translation:
Your friend roster is full.
Enter a friend code after
erasing data.

original:
You do not have a friend
code. Your friend code
will be generated once
you connect to Nintendo
WFC.
translation:
You do not have a friend
code. Your friend code
will be generated once
you connect to Nintendo
WFC.

original:
Connecting to Nintendo
WFC...
Please wait a moment...
translation:
Connecting to Nintendo
WFC...
Please wait a moment...

original:
Unable to connect to
Nintendo WFC.
translation:
Unable to connect to
Nintendo WFC.

original:
Confirm your access point
settings in Nintendo
WFC setup.
translation:
Confirm your access point
settings in Nintendo
WFC setup.

original:
You have disconnected
from Nintendo WFC.
translation:
You have disconnected
from Nintendo WFC.

original:
Connection to opponent
has been lost.
translation:
Connection to opponent
has been lost.

original:
Nintendo WFC treats your
Mario Kart DS Game Card
and Nintendo DS as a set.
translation:
Nintendo WFC treats your
Mario Kart DS Game Card
and Nintendo DS as a set.

original:
Save this Nintendo DS
system's Nintendo WFC
configuration to this
Game Card and connect to
Nintendo WFC?
translation:
Save this Nintendo DS
system's Nintendo WFC
configuration to this
Game Card and connect to
Nintendo WFC?

original:
The Wi-Fi ID from this
Nintendo DS has been
saved to the Game Card.
translation:
The Wi-Fi ID from this
Nintendo DS has been
saved to the Game Card.

original:
From now on, please use
this Nintendo DS when
attempting to connect to
Nintendo WFC.
translation:
From now on, please use
this Nintendo DS when
attempting to connect to
Nintendo WFC.

original:
Unable to connect to
Nintendo WFC because the
Wi-Fi ID from the
Nintendo DS and the Game
Card do not match.
translation:
Unable to connect to
Nintendo WFC because the
Wi-Fi ID from the
Nintendo DS and the Game
Card do not match.

original:
When you update your
Wi-Fi ID, you will lose
any data used to connect
to Nintendo WFC up to
this point.
translation:
When you update your
Wi-Fi ID, you will lose
any data used to connect
to Nintendo WFC up to
this point.

original:
Update the Wi-Fi ID
saved to this Game Card
anyway?
translation:
Update the Wi-Fi ID
saved to this Game Card
anyway?

original:
You can use your existing
list of friends with this
game.
translation:
You can use your existing
list of friends with this
game.

original:
However, to race against
friends on Nintendo WFC,
your friends will need to
re-register you in their
friend rosters.
translation:
However, to race against
friends on Nintendo WFC,
your friends will need to
re-register you in their
friend rosters.

original:
Do you still want to
update?
translation:
Do you still want to
update?

original:
Please see your Nintendo
DS Game Card instruction
booklet for more info.
translation:
Please see your Nintendo
DS Game Card instruction
booklet for more info.

original:
This Wi-Fi ID was
inactive for a long
period of time and has
been erased.
translation:
This Wi-Fi ID was
inactive for a long
period of time and has
been erased.

original:
Nintendo WFC service for
this software has been
halted.
translation:
Nintendo WFC service for
this software has been
halted.

original:
No compatible access
point in range.
translation:
No compatible access
point in range.

original:
Unable to connect to the
Nintendo Wi-Fi USB
Connector.
translation:
Unable to connect to the
Nintendo Wi-Fi USB
Connector.

original:
Please confirm connection
settings in the Nintendo
WFC setup.
translation:
Please confirm connection
settings in the Nintendo
WFC setup.

original:
Unable to find a
compatible access
point. Please try again.
translation:
Unable to find a
compatible access
point. Please try again.

original:
Unable to connect. Either
the server is experiencing
high traffic volumes or
Nintendo WFC service is
currently down.
translation:
Unable to connect. Either
the server is experiencing
high traffic volumes or
Nintendo WFC service is
currently down.

original:
Please wait a little
while, then try again.
translation:
Please wait a little
while, then try again.

original:
The access point is busy.
You cannot connect.
translation:
The access point is busy.
You cannot connect.

original:
[255:00000100]Error Code [1:ff00][255:00000000]
For help, call
1-800-895-1672 in the
USA or Canada, or visit
www.nintendowifi.com.
translation:
[255:00000100]Error Code [1:ff00][255:00000000]
For help, call
1-800-895-1672 in the
USA or Canada, or visit
www.nintendowifi.com.
